'''1.7.10-pre4''' is the fourth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.7.10]], released on June 18, 2014,<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|479266800052756480|Minecraft snapshot 14w25a & 1.7.10 pre-release 4 has been released. Check it out!|June 18, 2014}}</ref> which provides further upgrades to [[Realms]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Minecraft Realms]]'''
* The ability to upload worlds to Realms.
* An option to allow the Realms owner to enable [[command block]]s.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.7.10-pre4|prefix=Minecraft|otherissuescount=1
|;previous
|56572|Realms player activity screen squashed to bottom.
}}
'''Other fixes'''
* Fixed some possible future-compatibility issues.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* This version was released on the same day as [[14w25a]].
* This version came out exactly six years before [[Java Edition 1.16 Release Candidate 1|1.16 Release Candidate 1]] and four years after [[Infdev 20100618]].
